string_to_speak: Welcome to the CSR Learn App. Press 1 for learning keyboard. Press 2 for playing with 0 to 9

hashmap.string: Congrats, you selected to learn the keyboard
Congrats, you selected to learn the 0-9 addition
Congrats, you selected to play with one digit addition
Congrats, you selected to play with one and two digit addition
Congrats, you selected to play with 2 digit addition
